alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 30 at 9:35PM EST until December 31 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna, Northern Wayne, Wyoming, Lackawanna, Luzerne, Pike and Southern Wayne counties. In New York, Chemung, Tompkins, Cortland, Chenango, Otsego, Tioga, Broome, Delaware and Sullivan counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense fog will continue over the area through early tomorrow morning. Commuters should allow extra time to travel tonight through tomorrow morning. Leave plenty of room between vehicles and use low beam headlights as much as possible..
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming
